messages:
Name: Marco Asensio
Nationality: Spain
Date of Birth: January 21, 1996
Position: Attacker
Current club: Paris Saint-Germain
Ligue 1 clubs played for: Paris Saint-Germain
Paris Saint-Germain attacker Marco Asensio was not involved in any of the three Ligue 1 matches that his club have played so far in 2025/2026.
In the side's next Ligue 1 game on September 14, Paris Saint-Germain face a home match against Lens.
Last season, Asensio played a combined 25 Premier League and Ligue 1 games between Aston Villa (13) and Paris Saint-Germain (12), scoring five goals and providing five assists.
Prior to linking up with Paris Saint-Germain in July 2023, Asensio made 191 league appearances in total at Real Madrid, scoring 37 goals and providing 21 assists.

Asensio debuted in a Ligue 1 fixture for Paris Saint-Germain on August 12, 2023 as a starter against Lorient at the age of 27 years and 203 days. Overall, in his Ligue 1 career, he has appeared 31 times in the competition, with six goals scored and nine assists.
